title: Retry deployment after technical issue

requirements.text: Deploy the current application state to the Internet Computer network, ensuring both the frontend assets and the backend canister compile and deploy successfully without errors.
acceptanceCriteria: The backend canister (backend/main.mo) compiles without errors
Both canisters are deployed to the Internet Computer network
The deployed application is accessible via its canister URL
No deployment errors or technical snafus occur

constraints: Do not modify any application code or features
Do not change the backend schema or frontend UI
This is a deployment retry only, not a code change request
nonGoals: Changing the visual theme or UI components
Updating data models or storage logic
